DOC.brief_summary: The aim study verify high value RDW useful prognostic marker ICU mortality 90-days mortality . Moreover , investigate prognostic value RDW specific subgroup population clinical characteristic wich may modify RDW baseline value , i.e . transfused patient patient high marker hemolysis
DOC.brief_title: Red Cell Distribution Width ( RDW ) Prognostic Marker ICU
DOC.criteria: Unselected ICU patient Length stay ICU < 48 hour Hematological disease Age < 18 year
